dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT s.shipment_xid booking_request, cv.charter_voyage_xid booking_confirm, loc1.location_name carrier, TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date( (SELECT itrans.insert_date FROM i_transaction itrans WHERE itrans.object_gid = s.shipment_gid AND itrans.transaction_code = 'I' AND itrans.status = 'FRESH' AND ROWNUM = 1), (SELECT location_gid FROM location WHERE city = 'OVERLAND PARK' AND province_code = 'KS' AND ROWNUM = 1) ),'MM/DD/YY hh:mi am') req_trans, TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date( itr.insert_date, (SELECT location_gid FROM location WHERE city = 'OVERLAND PARK' AND province_code = 'KS' AND ROWNUM = 1) ),'MM/DD/YY hh:mi am') resp_trans, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND((TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(itr.insert_date,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((SELECT itrans.insert_date FROM i_transaction itrans WHERE itrans.object_gid = s.shipment_gid AND itrans.transaction_code = 'I' AND itrans.status = 'FRESH' AND ROWNUM = 1),'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) * 24,1),'999,999,990.0')) hrs FROM shipment s INNER JOIN location loc1 ON s.servprov_gid = loc1.location_gid INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid LIKE '%20FT_22GP_WEIGHT' INNER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr ON '%' || s.shipment_xid || '%' LIKE '%' || cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_value || '%' AND cvr.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_BOOKING REQUEST NUMBER' INNER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cvr.charter_voyage_gid = cv.charter_voyage_gid INNER JOIN i_transaction itr ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = itr.object_gid WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/NVO' AND (TO_DATE((SELECT MIN(itrans.insert_date) FROM i_transaction itrans WHERE itrans.object_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1),'dd-mm-rr') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE((SELECT MIN(itrans.insert_date) FROM i_transaction itrans WHERE itrans.object_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1),'dd-mm-rr') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND ((:CARRIER_ID IS NULL) OR (NOT :CARRIER_ID IS NULL AND s.servprov_gid = :CARRIER_ID)) AND ((:SHIPMENT_ID IS NULL) OR (NOT :SHIPMENT_ID IS NULL AND s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID)) ORDER BY s.shipment_xid, itr.insert_date
